DOC.criteria: < 36 year old day randomisation FSH < 12 ( early follicular phase ) Normal ultrasound scan , i.e . presence ovary , without evidence abnormality within 6 month prior randomisation . Regular menstrual cycle 2135 day , presumed ovulatory . BMI 18 29 ( inclusive ) 1st 2nd trial IVF ICSI ≥ 36 year old day randomisation Endometriosis ≥ grade 3 PCOS Poor responder ( development < 4 follicle previous IVF/ICSI cycle ) Endocrine metabolic abnormality ( pituitary , adrenal , pancreas , liver kidney )
